long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The all-in-one productivity tool for people working from home: To-do list, distraction blocker and motivator.

HOLD X is making productivity simple. With HOLD you can plan your day from within your browser and execute without distractions. Get started in 10 seconds, save up to two hours a day and never miss a deadline again.

HOW IT WORKS:
üìù Prioritise - Start by making a quick and simple plan for the day using the chrome extension widget. You could also sync the tasks from your Asana account.

‚è± Focus - With the click of a button HOLD will block distraction across your chrome browser, allowing you to focus on the task at hand.

üìä Improve - HOLD X will learn from your behaviour and provide you with actionable feedback so you can improve your daily productivity and progress.

PRIVACY NOTE:
We don‚Äôt sell our user data. Ever. We monetize the product from users paying a subscription fee for the premium features. This is to ensure that we could continue to develop this product with the end-user in mind, supported by a sustainable and ethical business model.
